cause.description:
Worship the chickens for they are creators of this earth, and has sent their only descendants to live amongst us...
1. chickens created the universe in six days
2. chickens sent their only descendants to earth to live amongst us
3. they are fried for our sins
4. all other religions are lies and their followers must be converted or else they will burn in ovens
cause.name: Chruch of the Chickens
